snippet.title: INTO THE DIM iOS Gameplay
snippet.description:
"With a complete, classic audio and visual theme in check, Into The Dim’s gameplay is what I found to be most engaging" - Tom Christiansen, Indie Game Magazine

"Charming roguelike RPG" - Christian Valentin, Pocket Gamer

"Pretty promising & very challenging" - Carter Dotson, TouchArcade

"Keep your eyes peeled for the game, because it'll definitely be worth the download" - Joe White, App Advice

"Has a nostalgic feel" - Ian Porter, GameMob

"A very interesting graphical style and solid gameplay experience" - Francesco, TouchTapPlay

Into the Dim is a mysterious RPG adventure of a boy and his dog. Explore tricky dungeons, think steps ahead and evolve traps. Solve puzzles, outwit and defeat enemies and uncover the town mystery!

Features:
- dungeons with secrets
- tricky puzzles
- various enemies
- collectable treasures
- universal (play on all your devices)

iTunes link: https://geo.itunes.apple.com/nz/app/into-the-dim/id1045102110?mt=8&at=1l3vmto
